website_summaries.verdict: An official or intermediate-sized basketball meant for older children working on more advanced control and skills.
pros: The heavy-duty leather and stitching is supported with a cushioned core for more comfortable play
Intermediate size (one option) is the right size for medium-sized hands and can be used as a practice ball
cons: Ball tends to deflate after some repeated use or play

customer_reviews.title: Wilson Ncaa Final Four Edition (29.5 in)
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from shooting some hoops and i gotta say, this ball is great, good grip, the looks and feels awesome, very light, it came inflated also..it seems smaller than a regular 29.5 inch ball but i love it anyways
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic indoor ball. I also purchased the Wilson replica game ball which I liked a lot better. Spend a few extra bucks and buy the other one. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mel_22

customer_reviews.title: Great out door ball. Subpar indoor ball.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a professional ball by any means, but it's a great out door ball. For a beater you can just use on any surface, and for the price, it really just comes down to preference. It has some grip to it and definitely does not "slide" off your hands. Doesn't have any weird lumps when its fully pumped and just a great out door ball in general. My only con with this is that it does not perform well indoor. It might have been the ball that i got, but the grooves in the ball are a bit rough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my six year old
customer_reviews.text: I got this ball for my six year old to practice at home, and it is perfect for his size (he is 4 feet tall). I needed to add some air after receiving it, but other than that, it is in perfect condition after three months (even I store it in an outside cabinet).
customer_reviews.author: Ryott

customer_reviews.title: A good grip-texture but leaky air valve
customer_reviews.text: This is an indoor/outdoor ball and my initial impression is good. I like the feel and texture of its composite leather... grippy enough without being over-grippy like a rubber material would be. The ball did need to be inflated when it arrived but that’s simple and easy. The Problem became that the ball shipped with a bad/leaking air valve. So I’m planning to replace that myself now. A Valve Kit cost $16 on amazon so the $19 ball now costs $35 to use properly. Went from being a deal to just a normal cost item I have to wait to use, for the second time, instead of buying at the store and using the same day.
customer_reviews.author: DESIGNER ae

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays competitive basketball. When indoor she always uses her Wilson Evolution (which is 100 ties better than this ball, but also costs significantly more and almost never goes on sale) but now, during the corona pandemic, all practices and games are outdoor for safety reasons and the outdoor surface would completely destroy the Evolution's leather very quickly. This ball is perfect for these outdoor practices. Its material is nice enough to play (it's not soft and tacky like the Evolution, but it also doesn't feel nasty like the $8-$15 rubber basketballs) but sturdy enough to withstand dribbling on a blacktop surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ofer

customer_reviews.title: Wilson's Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves it. It arrived on time, packaged carefully and in good shape. The item was a described. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: claybeads

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: School coach here. We use Wilson Evo's for indoor practices, but occasionally I like to take guys outside for practices and these balls are the best. Rubber balls are trash and anything this nice usually costs $30-$50. So, coming in around $20 is great. Deep channels. It is to outdoor balls what Evo's are to indoor. Deep channels and good grip. If you like weak channels like spaldin TF, don't get this ball
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Somehow it feels smaller that 29.5
customer_reviews.text: I know it says "official size", but feels smaller than 29.5", when I compared it with the Wilson NCAA Game Ball in my other hand. Maybe it's because it's less soft.
customer_reviews.author: jzlthssw

customer_reviews.title: Good all around ball
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a new ball for the driveway and outdoor practice. My daughter plays varsity basketball and needed a new ball to workout when we don't have access to the gym. We needed something that will hold up outside but still had a good feel to it. Our school uses TF-1000's for games and practice so we wanted a decent quality ball. This actually feels great and has held up well to outdoors so far. You can easily use it in the gym as well. If you want an indoor only ball you could spend a little more but this is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Workshop_Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great value, indoor ball
customer_reviews.text: A great ball for the price but there are some things to put attention to: the grip of the ball deteriotes over time in outdoor use and should probably used specifically for indoor use. Otherwise this is one of the best balls in the price range and for the size and is my second purchase from Wilson with this grip. I would recommend a rubber outdoor ball for outdoor players who want durable and cheap basketballs from the Wilson while keeping this as a indoor ball.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for casual players on Indoor courts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could play once in a while, shoot some hoops, that's about it. Came packaged well, was deflated a bit but I had a bike pump around and was able to pump some air into it soon after. Pros - Works well (atleast on an indoor court that I tried) - Don't see it having problems with outdoor courts either, it is of solid quality Cons - None really, can't go wrong with this quality at such a price
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Pink is the new orange
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ball which is orange, right? I was sent a PINK ball however and returned it. Two days later I noticed Spalding basketballs for sale at hardware store. They were true outdoor balls, ORANGE, and $2 less than I had paid online so I bought one. And it’s GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Lewi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It arrived somewhat flat, which I thought was pretty normal. However weeks later we still have to constantly pump it up full of air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the $
customer_reviews.text: Its a great cheap ball. Holding up well; good for everyday play. No issues. Maybe there are better balls but for my kids to grab a ball here and there; this was well worth the $. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: matt M

customer_reviews.title: As listed, great price
customer_reviews.text: Ball seems to be correct size. I think other reviews who mention it being small might have ordered the 28.5" which is a girls ball. Very grippy and a great deal when we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold air very well. Have to refill with air too many times. Finally just through it in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: King James

customer_reviews.title: It's a ball
customer_reviews.text: Outer material could be better formed, but it's a ball..... what more do you want???
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this exact ball and it’s excellent for the $. I still have and use the first one too but our son wanted one too.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J. Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The ball bounces and feels great. If you're looking to play indoors, it's much better than Spalding street, for around the same price. The only flaw, as others have pointed out, is the small barcode that's super slippery.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely can recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons playing 6 th grade basketball. Has a nice feel. It holds air well. All around great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Ball is cheap!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ball needs to be pumped every time before use. Should have returned it when it did not come in packaging . It just came in a cardboard box. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Spain

customer_reviews.title: Pressure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these due to the ratings and price but I've come across a problem that both of them shared - they will not hold there pressure and I find myself constantly refilling them up with air.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great ball; stays inflated.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Replaced month old Spalding ball I bought here that would deflate every 24hrs. Has kept its inflation since I bought it after near daily outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son, he loves it. All the kids on his team like to practice with it cause it’s their good ball’
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: The ball is very good. It is a good size.The tape does not fall off.Excellent basketball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed inflation valve is off set on the ball
customer_reviews.text: The composite leather overlaps the valve stem so the ball isn't flush with the valve seems a little silly this cant be manufactured properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the feel...
customer_reviews.text: The is a good value for this ball. The feel and grip is great fro dribbling and he weight feel just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Color fades easily and the grip goes down a little quicker than preferred with frequent outdoor play. My boys like it. Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Product better than expected. Use them for a youth basketball student center.
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor basketball
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and has great value. It came inflated too. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: For price it’s good but not great. Good value for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quality basketball for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ball is as described. Got it on sale for under $20 so it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Highley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My son is having a ball playing everyday with it
customer_reviews.author: mozhgan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great basketballs for the money! We bought these for a grade school and the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: snj world

customer_reviews.title: Slippery letters
customer_reviews.text: This ball's synthetic leather cover has excellent feel. However, I subtract one star because the large Wilson letters logo is slippery. Sometimes, I would lose control of the ball when I do a crossover because the slippery letters.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chang

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine indoor basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fine indoor basketball. Good for daily/weekly practice. Solid feel.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent ball, my last one has lasted years, good outside cover for outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my sons basketball which at worn out due to use. This ball is a good quality, durable ball that has a great "feel" to it. Will definitely order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Minfar

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this ball
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this ball. great fell, great price $13 and now my son is practicing dribbling all the time.
customer_reviews.author: wtpa

customer_reviews.title: Arrived too flat to use
customer_reviews.text: Good basketball, but arrived with too little air to actually bounce. I do not have an air pump, so quite inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for old worn basketball
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Replacement for an old worn out one. Son seemed happy.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Came deflated
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated and we keep having to blow it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mahrya

customer_reviews.title: Very great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price . And good ball for my son to practice with
customer_reviews.author: javon white

customer_reviews.title: Defective ball keeps going flat
customer_reviews.text: Ball arrived in timely manner however it arrived slightly flat so I figured it was new just needed some air but it won't hold the air either. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting it my opinion..
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and that's all that matters to me lol
customer_reviews.author: Profe380

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Feels much better than a rubber ball and has a similar life span.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tsukamoto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this basketball and it's holding up with lots of outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: How can Wilson make such a bad ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball will not hold air. Seems like this is not the first one as others have had the same problem. returned ball
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M.

customer_reviews.title: If you send a ball with Barry any air, at least send a pump.
customer_reviews.text: If you send a ball with Barry any air, at least send a pump.... so frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Moti Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Good price
customer_reviews.text: Used these for basketball practice for junior team . Great price worked well
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Bad seals around ball.
customer_reviews.text: Ball busted soon after it arrived. The seal was not strong and would not keep the ball inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple basketball my husband dribbles when walking the dog ;-)
customer_reviews.author: E. Barz

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ball for the kids to use outside. Shame that amazon can’t get their shipping figured out though, shouldn’t offer 1 day shipping if they can’t actually do it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna H

customer_reviews.title: Hole in the ball
customer_reviews.text: Came flat, assumed it was just old and needed to be pumped, after pumping it, turns out it just came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. Needed to put a little air in it but, other than that, it’s great for my teenage son and his friends to play a game.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Damage to my car
customer_reviews.text: My car was hit between 2:25-5. The package was great but I am not happy that my car got hit and they never told me
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: leak air
customer_reviews.text: Played a few days. This ball leaks air and I have to pump everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: Ball does not hold air. Was a gift for my nephew and it lost air after one day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality materials, but functions OK
customer_reviews.text: Good looking ball when fully inflated. But once deflated, composite leather separates from the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kim Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Im a Prime member and it took 10 days to get a Basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I'm paying for Prime membership and it takes 10 days to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Clifford

customer_reviews.title: No air
customer_reviews.text: Very bad came with almost no air and would barely bounce
customer_reviews.author: Alex Z.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this basketball. Great price. Our grandson grinned from ear to ear.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough ball. Could be more grippy and have a bit better bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived with leak
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a leak and would not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 10101

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My boy is very happy with this very nicely priced B-ball. Right on time! Fully aired up and ready to hit the court. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jim denton

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a number of balls to use at work for ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a number of balls to use at work for a safety contest and give away. The basketballs were well received.
customer_reviews.author: Facilities Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Trouble holding air
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses began to deflate. It won't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice has excellent grip came just the way they said it would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in flat. I've had it about a month & the leather is starting to Peel.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cope

customer_reviews.title: not good for street ball
customer_reviews.text: Its ok to ball with. Not so great on grip.feels hard.dont like the way it bounces. My old Zio is better to play with than this.
customer_reviews.author: Pharez

customer_reviews.title: Lame Bounce
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to bounce well, even when inflated to recommended PSI. Leather wrapping has some noticeable imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: James Doucet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it but he thinks it is too nice to use outside.
customer_reviews.author: Swish

customer_reviews.title: Basketball good for baskets
customer_reviews.text: Nice basketball. It bounces. Goes in the hoop. Good for dribbling.
customer_reviews.author: nctarheel22

customer_reviews.title: It is a great feeling ball but I received mine partially deflated
customer_reviews.text: It is a great feeling ball but I received mine partially deflated. I took it overseas with me. I inflated it and used it on an outdoor court. It handled great. I was impressed. The next day it was soft. I inflated and used it again in the evening. I checked it a few hours after and it was soft. The expense to return it in time for a replacement or refund isn't worth it economically. But it is a great ball.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: i Bought it Long Time Ago It would be nicer ...
customer_reviews.text: i Bought it Long Time Ago It would be nicer if there's a pin included to deflate to fit in my luggage to bring home in the Philippines
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but stays flat. Buy a never flat ball.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but stays flat. Buy a never flat ball.
customer_reviews.author: Dashoo1

customer_reviews.title: Decent basketball
customer_reviews.text: This was part of a gift for my hubby with final four tickets! It’s a nice basketball and I hope he gets to use it with his grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: pom love

customer_reviews.title: Good for more serious players
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a teenage nephew Plays a lot of indoor B-ball. Haven't heard any more about the ball
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this basketball for a Christmas present for my son. Will not stay inflated longer than a day! So disappointed in this product. I had higher standards for a Wilson brand ball!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Tuttle

product_meta.title: Wilson NCAA Final Four Edition Basketball
product_meta.description: It’s hard to make it to the Final Four, but it’s easier to imagine yourself there with Wilson’s NCAA Final Four Ball. It’s built from premium material to withstand the hours of practice it takes to succeed in March because you don’t have to wait until the big dance to get ready for madness.
feature_bullets: Premium Carcass Construction – Excellent rebound and durability
